grid_order_tip_sub_content1: Set your price range, divide your investment into several parts and automatically buy low sell high for you ,when price goses down the bot will buy gradually and when price goes up it will also sell gradually, form which the bot help you earn lots of stable grid profits.
grid_order_tip_sub_content2:
First step: Select pair that fluctuates a lot and its base coin is undervalued
Second step: according to price trend, decide your grid bot price range, the highest price and the lowest price
Third step: Decide the number of your grid
Fourth Step: Decide your investment per grid
You could setup Stop-loss price if you need.(optional)

Please note: Since the grid bot need to trade 7*24 ceaselessly, you need to upload your API key to BitUniverse server, so please upload your API key in the next step.

indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart1: 1. Create an “Infinity Grid Bot” on Pionex. You'll get the BUB awards according to your Funds-Level and Lasting Time. The Bot has to make more than 50 transactions to be valid in this event and participants can create multiple bots to accelerate the speed of earning BUB.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart2: 1. Start an LTC grid trading bot (LTC/XX) with more than $500 USDT.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart2_1: 2. The bot should generate more than 50 transactions and last for more than 48 hours.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart3: 3. The Funds-Level is determined by the funds with single bot. Such as, one participant create two 400 USDT bots. Both of the bots won't qualified cause they didn't reach the lowest requirement 500 USDT.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart4: 1. Only the trading volume of “Grid Trading Bot” and “Infinity Grid Bot” will be counted.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart5: 2. Top 10 participants will be awarded the following prize
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart6: * The trading volume of previous trading king was 1,200,000 USDT in 7 days. There's the minimum trading volume for each rank: Rank 1 — Trading Volume should be higher than 2,000,000 USDT, Rank 2 — Trading Volume should be higher than 1,000,000 USDT, Rank 3 — Trading Volume should be higher than 500,000 USDT, Rank 4~10 — Trading Volume should be higher than 100,000 USDT
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart7: ** Rule of the trading fee discount: the trading fee will be rebated on monthly basis (including the trading fee in the competition period). Only the trading volume from “Grid Trading Bot” and “Infinity Grid Bot” will be rebated. Base currency rebated for buy orders, quote currency rebated for sell orders.
indefiniteGridCompetition_ranking_conten: Annualized Profit Competition — Win 300 BUB even with small funds
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart8: 1. During the event period, participants will also join the “Annualized Profit Return” Leaderboard, if their fund of infinite grid bot is more than 500 USDT and the lasting time should be more than 48 hours
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart9: 2. Participants could create multiple bots to compete for the championship. Only the highest score will be recorded under the same account.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart10: 1. Pionex reserves the right to cancel or amend the Competition or Competition Rules at our sole discretion.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart11: 2. Risk Warning: Digital currency is a high-level risk investment. Investors should be cautious in purchasing and pay attention to investment risks.
indefiniteGridCompetition_bodypart12: 3. Winner can pick one of the following 20 assets to list on Pionex: LINK, HC, XTZ, XEM, ZEC, LSK, BTG, QTUM, DOGE, VET, BAT, OMG, DCR, BTT, KMD, NPXS, BTM, WAVES, ZRX, BTS

fundBuynow_text1: PiHodl arbitrage has been running for more than 80 weeks with a very low drawdown (0.8%). It remains 0% drawdown since the beginning of this year. The PiHodl team is the top market maker in several exchanges, which has the lowest trading fee and the highest maker rebate。
fundContent_Team: How can PiHodl achieve high-frequency arbitrage
fundContentTeam_list_title4: Extreme large fund scale and long performance period
fundContentTeam_list_conText1: Having a extremely low transaction fee is the base for performing high-frequency trading. Under extremely large transactions, the lower the fee, the more opportunities you can capture.
fundContentTeam_list_conText2: The strong system engineering capability enables the arbitrage system to capture fleeting arbitrage opportunities and place orders in the first place. This represents the ability to secure systems, communicate extremely high performance and high-speed data analysis and cleaning.
fundContentTeam_list_conText3: The cryptocurrency market is running 24/7 in the world. The stability of the service of each exchange is different from that of the traditional market. At the same time, the volatility is much higher than the traditional market, so it needs stronger fault tolerance, redundancy and risk control to ensure the arbitrage system able to operate without interruption and obtain the most arbitrage opportunities.
fundContentTeam_list_conText4: Short-term capture of arbitrage opportunities to achieve high returns does not represent that a large-scale operation can sustain high returns and low retracements. The size of the funds managed by the arbitrage system and the historical running time are the ultimate criteria for the reliability of an arbitrage product.

fundContent_Risk_agreement9: 9.Because some irresistible factors such as network latency, computer system failure and, etc may cause PiHodl Investment plan to pause, stop, or deviate. And Pionex.com will do our best to ensure the project but not promise PiHodl Investment plan system whether it can run stable and effective with these irresistible factors happening. contest_season_3_intro:
To encourage great traders to show how they used the Pionex trading tools, Pionex holds a series of trading tournaments. Participants could get Pionex Points, BUB, or USDT as rewards by winning the tournament. Other users could check and learn how top traders traded by clicking their profile.
    
 In Season 3, there're 2 different leaderboards! One is for "total profit" (USD), another is for "ROI" (%). Participants are allowed to win both awards with the same account on each leaderboard.
contest_season_3_awards_1:
Participants could earn Pionex Points (PP) by winning the tournament. You'll get BUB or USDT with the following ratio, 1 PP = 10 BUB or 1 PP = 5 USDT.
    
 Participants can accumulate PP by attending each season of the tournament, which is the points that we select as TopTrader on Pionex.
    
 According to your ranking on "Total Profit" or "ROI", you can get awards as following.
    
 1. Top 7 winner will get PPs in the Daily Ranking every day.
contest_season_3_awards_2: 2. Top 10 winners of the season 3 will get PP as follows
contest_season_3_awards_3:
3. Special Awards: participants who have a better ranking than “HAZE” will equally share a PP pool according to daily ranking (20 PP) and the final ranking (100 PP)
    
 Tournament Period: 2 weeks (14 days)
    
 Season 3 Period: 2020/04/27 04:00 - 2020/05/11 03:59 (UTC)
contest_season_3_rules:
1. Participants will be ranked by the percentage change of their account balance.
 (Final Balance - Initial Balance) / Initial Balance
    
 Initial Balance: the initial balance of your account when the tournament start.
 Final Balance: the balance of your account when the tournament end.
    
 The ranking will be ranked by the percentage change of the daily profit.
    
 2. Participants are not allowed to deposit, withdraw, or to use PiHodl during the tournament period.
contest_season_3_notice:
Notice: 
    If there's any withdrawal, deposit, PiHodl redemption, or PiHodl subscription, you'll be excluded from the Daily Ranking and the Final Ranking. But you're still allowed to join the Daily Ranking the day after that.
contest_season_3_how_to_join_content: Users with more than 200 USDT assets on Pionex could join the tournament. Sign up through the sign-up form on the upper right of this page.
contest_new_explain:
Daily ROI: the rate of return according to the daily snapshot.
    
 ([Current Balance - The Previous Day's Balance]/The Previous Day's Balance)
    
 The period of the daily ROI calculation: 04:00 ~ next day 04:00 (UTC)
    
 Total ROI: the rate of return compared to the initial balance at the snapshot moment.
    
 ([Current Balance - Initial Balance]/Initial Balance)
    
 The period of the total ROI calculation: 4/27 04:00 ~ 5/11 04:00 (UTC)
    
 N/A: Participants who have deposits, withdrawals, or PiHodl redemption and subscription will be considered as violating the competition rules. Their daily profit ranking and total profit ranking will be N/A.
contest_new_explain_profit_value:
Daily Profit: the profit compared to the daily snapshot
   
 [Current Balance - Net Deposit - The Previous Day's Balance]
   
 The duration for daily profit: 04:00 ~ next day 04:00 (UTC)
   
 Total Profit: the total profit compared to the initial balance.
   
 [Current Balance - Net Deposit - Initial Balance]
   
 The duration for total profit: 4/27 04:00 ~ 5/11 04:00 (UTC)
   
 N/A: participants who violate the tournament rules will have N/A on their ranking.
contest_user_desc:
Balance: the equivalent balance in USD
     
 Profit: the net profit of the participant.
     
 Daily ROI: the rate of return according to the daily snapshot.
     
 ([Current Balance - The Previous Day's Balance]/The Previous Day's Balance)
     
 The duration for daily ROI: 04:00 ~ next day 04:00 (UTC)
     
 ROI: the rate of return compared to the initial balance at the snapshot moment.
     
 ([Current Balance - Initial Balance]/Initial Balance)
     
 The duration for ROI: 4/27 04:00 ~ 5/11 04:00 (UTC)
     
 Annualized Return: period returns re-scaled to a period of one year
     
 Current Order: the number of active bots at the snapshot.
     
 Accumulated Order: the number of all the bots at the sanpshot.
     
 Win Rate: Profitable orders divided by total orders.
     
 MDD: The highest ROI minus the lowst ROI in a hourly snapshot basis.

leverage_merge_split_action_desc:
1. All existing bot trading orders and manual orders trading on {coin} will be canceled automatically. All the {coin} and USDT frozen by trading bots will be returned to users' spot accounts directly.
2. Tradings on {coin} and {coin1} will be suspended.
3. We will then take a snapshot of {coin} balances in users' accounts and begin the reverse token split of {coin} tokens at a ratio of {multiplier} {coin} (before the reverse split) = 1 {coin} (after the reverse split).
4. The balances of the {coin} will be updated, and the tradings for {coin} and {coin1} will be opened at this time.
Please check the {coin} asset in "My holding assets balance" after the reverse split.
leverage_merge_done_announce_content:
Dear users,
To provide a better trading experience for our users, {coin} have completed a 1-for-{multiplier} reverse token split, starting at {time}, {year}.{month}.{day}. The total asset value of {coin}, that a user held will not be affected by the reverse split.
leverage_merge_announce_content:
Dear Users,
To provide a better trading experience for our users, {coin} will undergo a 1-for-{multiplier} reverse token split, starting at {time}, {year}.{month}.{day}. The process will take approximately 30 minutes, and the total asset value of {coin}, that a user held will not be affected by the reverse split.
leverage_merge_announce_about: About the reverse split of the Pionex Leveraged Token
leverage_merge_announce_about_content:
When the leveraged token price is less than 0.05 USDT, to avoid having any adverse effect on users' trading experience, Pionex will undergo a reverse token split on that leveraged token.
A reverse token split is a process that consolidates the existing number of issued tokens into a smaller number of proportionally more valuable tokens.
Based on the ratio of the {multiplier}-to-1 reverse split of {coin}, if the price of {coin} is 0.05 USDT and a user holds {multiplier} {coin} before the reverse split, the user will end up holding 1 {coin} worth {value} USDT each after the reverse split. The total value of the {coin} holding by the user will not change and remain {value} USDT before or after the reverse split.

sign_up_institution_modal_content:
How to Create an Institution Account:
  1. Register an account using the email address of institution (“Registered Email”).
  2. Please download the Institution client onboarding bundle.
  3. Please fill the Pionex Institution Due Diligence list and prepare the requested documents (you can choose between Word version and PDF version).
  4. Please fill the Authorization Letter-Institution client (optional).
  5. Please use the Registered Email to send completed Pionex Institution Due Diligence list and requested documents to {email}.Please use “entity name-account opening” as email subject.
  6. Our compliance team will process your application, during which we may ask for additional information or documents.

If application is approved, we will notify you by email.Reminder: Please keep Pionex updated for any change to the information and documents provided through your application, by sending an email to us within 7 days of such changes.

Email: {email}

financing_lend_put_strike_ratio_tip:
Loan-to-Value Ratio determines how much USDT can be loaned.
 Loan-to-Value Ratio = Loan Amount / (Price of Collateral at the Time of Borrowing * Collateral Amount)
financing_lend_call_strike_ratio_tip:
Profit Sharing Level determines Profit Sharing Price. If the price at settlement is greater than Profit Sharing Price, Pionex will charge an additional profit-sharing amount at settlement. 
 Profit Sharing Price = Price at the Time of Borrowing * Profit Sharing Level
financing_lend_rebate_ratio_tip:
The percentage of profit that the user needs to pay to Pionex if the price goes above the profit sharing price at settlement.
 Assuming the profit sharing ratio is 30%, when the price at settlement is above the profit sharing price, the user needs to pay Pionex 30% of the part that is above the profit sharing price.
 Profit Sharing Amount = (Price at Settlement - Price at the Time of Borrowing * Profit Sharing Level) * Collateral Amount * Profit Sharing Ratio

financing_lend_trade_confirmation_info:
(Reference Number：[ {seqNumber} ] ) 

Dear User：
The purpose of this letter is a "Confirmation" for the loan Agreement. This agreement is to set forth the terms and conditions of the repurchase transaction entered into between us on the Contract Date referred to below.。
This Confirmation supplements and forms part of, and is subject to, the Master Agreement for Repurchase Transactions as entered into between us as the same may be amended from time to time (the "Agreement"). All provisions contained in the Agreement govern this Confirmation except as modified below. Words and phrases defined in the Agreement and used in this Confirmation shall have the same meaning herein as in the Agreement.
    

1. Contract Date of Transaction：[ {madeDate} ]
    

2. Type of Subject Asset:[ {base} ] ，Quantity of Subject Asset:[ {investAmount} ]
    

3. Opening Time:[ {startDate} ]
    

4. Downside Protection Price: [ {putStrike} ]USDT
    

5. Opening Amount: Opening Amount = Downside Protection Price * Quantity of Subject Asset. Opening Amount of this Transaction shall be[ {expectLend} ]USDT 。
    

6. Contractual Cryptocurrency:USDT
    

7. Annualized Fee Rate:[ {apiDisplay} ]
    

8. Fee: Fee = (Opening Amount)*(Annualized Fee Rate)*(number of seconds from Opening Time to Settlement Time)/3600/24/365. Fee for this transaction = [ {expectLend} ]*[ {api} ]*[ {loanTime} ]/3600/24/365 = [ {expectFee} ]USDT。
    

9. Settlement Time: [ {expireTime} ]
    

10. Settlement Price:  shall mean market price of the Subject Asset at the Settlement Time. Settlement Price shall equal to the average of the Settlement Index during the 30 minutes before the Settlement Time. The Settlement Index is a weighted average of prices from multiple top crypto asset exchanges.
    

11. Profit Sharing Price：[ {callStrike} ]USDT
    

12. Profit Sharing Ratio:  Profit Sharing Ratio of this Transaction shall be[ {rebateRatio} ]%。
    

13. Settlement Amount:
    

（1）If, at Settlement, Price at Settlement is below or equal to Downside Protection Price:
Settlement Amount = (Price at Settlement)*(Quantity of Subject Asset), i.e. Settlement Amount = (Price at Settlement)*[ {investAmount} ] ；or
    
（2）If, at settlement, Downside Protection Price < Settlement Price < Profit Sharing Price (excluding both Downside Protection Price and Profit Sharing Price):
Settlement Amount = Opening Amount, i.e. Settlement Amount = [ {expectLend} ]USDT；or
    
（3）If, at Settlement, Settlement Price is equal to or above Profit Sharing Price:
Settlement Amount = (Opening Amount) + (Settlement Price - Profit Sharing Price)*(Quantity of Subject Asset)*(Profit Sharing Ratio), i.e. Settlement Amount = [ {expectLend} ] +（Price at Settlement - [ {callStrike} ]）*[ {investAmount} ]*[ {rebateRatio} ]%。
    
14.   Transaction Rules:
    
（1）Transaction Rules at the Opening Time:
At the Opening Time, your account will be deducted the quantity of Subject Asset that was set forth in this confirmation. And, you shall pay the fee for this Transaction at the Opening Time. {platform} may deduct the fee from the Opening Amount and after such deduction, transfer the remaining portion of the Opening Amount to your account.
    
（2）Transaction Rules at the Settlement Time:
At Settlement, you shall pay the Settlement Amount in accordance with this Confirmation and Agreement for the repurchase of the Subject Asset. Once we receive the Settlement Amount from you, we will transfer the
equivalent Subject Asset to your account on the same day.
If your account balance at settlement is greater than or equal to the Settlement Amount, we will debit your account the amount that is equivalent to the Settlement Amount and subsequently transfer the Equivalent Subject Asset to your account.
If your account balance at Settlement is less than the Settlement Amount,{platform} shall have the right to reject your request for repurchase of the Equivalent Subject Asset after the Settlement and {platform} shall have the right to dispose the Equivalent Subject Asset at its sole discretion.

smart_invest_adviser_Sortino_Ratio_tip: Sortino Ratio is the ratio between the expected return of a trade and its downside risk. It's an alteration of Sharpe Ratio.
smart_invest_adviser_Sharpe_Ratio_tip: The ratio between return and risk of a trade. The higher is Sharpe Ratio, the better is the expected return for given certain level of risk.
smart_invest_adviser_Loss_Given_Exercise: The loss from execution of options which results in buying or selling asset at suboptimal price level. For instance, if the underlying asset price drops to $15,500 and nevertheless you still need to purchase the asset at $16,000 per the specification of the transaction, then there will be a $500 loss.
smart_invest_adviser_exercise_probabilit: Probability of buying asset if invest in Buy-the-dip; or probability of selling asset if invest in  Covered-Gain.
smart_invest_adviser_default_tip: Pi 1, Sortino Path Ratio, it is a proprietary Pi calculation. In any simulated market path, the time before expiration is divided into n periods, each path's Sortino Ratio is calculated based on the return in the period, the final value is the average value of these periodic ratios.
smart_invest_adviser_risk_indicator2_tip: Pi 2, Sortino Ratio, the ratio of return and downside risk (standard deviation of downside returns), the higher the ratio, the higher return under the same downside risk.
smart_invest_adviser_risk_indicator3_tip: Pi 3, Sharp Ratio, the ratio of return and risk (standard deviation of returns), the higher this ratio the higher return under the same risk.

activity_rules_desc_2nd:
1.During the event, by starting the “CopyBot” - “Bitcoin Growth Bot (800 Grids)” on the Pionex App, you can get a chance to participate in the lucky draw

2.During the event, by adding funds/creating another order for “Bitcoin Growth Bot (800 Grids)” on the “CopyBot”, you will get more additional lucky draw entries

3.During the event, the copied “Bitcoin Growth Bot (800 Grids)” running for more than 7 or 20 days will also receive additional lucky draw entries respectively. If the copied bot was started before the event, the running time would also be counted (the running time of multiple orders will be based on the longest one)

4.All the lucky draws will be calculated based on currently running orders. Copied bots that have been closed will not meet the requirements for the lucky draw

5.The cumulative value of adding funds/creating another order is calculated based on the USDT value, and the BTC amount is calculated based on the USDT value when funds are added

6.The event rewards will be issued together after the event. The cryptocurrency rewards will be sent to the winners’ Pionex wallets within 10 business days, and the winners of non-crypto rewards should contact the official Pionex customer service

7.Pionex reserves the right to the final interpretation of the terms and conditions of this event. Cheating behaviors are strictly prohibited, and Pionex has the right to cancel the qualification for winning the prize once cheating is discovered.

trigger_info_content:
Trigger Order will not freeze the margin until it is successfully triggered. And a Trigger order becomes a Market / Limit order after it is triggered. While pending execution, unfilled Market / Limit order will be shown in the list of Open Orders.

Your Trigger Order may not be triggered due to sharp market fluctuations, price or position limits, insufficient margin, system errors, etc.

You can also use Trigger Order with Reduce-only to close existing positions with take profit/stop loss, which can avoid the reverse opening operation of trigger orders that may be caused by manually closing.
trade_separate_buy_sell_info_content: Grid Buy/Sell is used to help you open a position with multiple orders within a grid with one click. For example, if you want to place 3 orders for 1 ETH at prices of 1800, 1700, and 1600 USDT respectively, you can set an upper limit price of 1800, a lower limit price of 1600, the grids (i.e. number of orders) of 3, per grid (i.e. the order quantity for each order) of 1 ETH, and choose arithmetic.

limit_info_content: it's an order to buy or sell at a specific price. Limit orders are not guaranteed to execute.
cross_info_content: All cross positions under the same margin asset share the same asset cross margin balance. In the event of liquidation, your assets full margin balance along with any remaining open positions under the asset may be forfeited.
isolated_info_content: Manage your risk on individual positions by restricting the amount of margin allocated to each. If the margin ratio of a position reached 100%, the position will be liquidated.

activity_rules_desc_kol:
1. Users who sign up on Pionex using the referral link/invitation code of 「{nickname}」 will automatically register for the event.

2. By starting the “CopyBot” - “Bitcoin Growth Bot(800 Grids)” on the Pionex App, you can get a chance to participate in the lucky draw

3. By adding funds / creating another order for “Bitcoin Growth Bot(800 Grids)” on the “CopyBot”, you will get more additional lucky draw entries

4. The copied “Bitcoin Growth Bot(800 Grids)” running for more than 7 or 20 days will also receive additional lucky draw entries, respectively.If the copied bot was started before the event, the running time would also be counted(the running time of multiple orders will be based on the longest one)

5. All the lucky draws will be calculated based on currently running orders.Copied bots that have been closed will not meet the requirements for the lucky draw

6. The cumulative value of adding funds / creating another order is calculated based on the USDT value, and the BTC amount is calculated based on the USDT value when funds are added

7. The event rewards will be issued together after the event.The cryptocurrency rewards will be sent to the winners’ Pionex wallets within 10 business days, and the winners of non - crypto rewards should contact the official Pionex customer service

8. Users who have won the Bitcoin trial fund will receive the prize within 10 business days after the event ends.The trial fund will automatically be used to run a new Bitcoin Growth Bot(800 Grids) and be locked in the bot.Pionex reserves the right to close the bot at a certain time in the future.By then, the user will be rewarded with all the positive Bitcoin profit made by the trial fund bot, and Pionex will cover the possible BTC loss made by the same bot.

9. Pionex reserves the right to the final interpretation of the terms and conditions of this event.Cheating behaviors are strictly prohibited, and Pionex has the right to cancel the qualification for winning the prize once cheating is discovered.

astria_fund_purchase_product_desc: ETH Principal-Protected No.1 is the first Easy Earn product created by Pionex that combines staking and option trading to provide you with a {low}% to {high}% annualized return in ETH. It relies on Pionex's strict risk control system to fully ensure the transaction security of users.
astria_fund_questions_num_1_how_principl: 1. How does ETH Principal-Protected No.1 achieve principal protection in ETH?

We combine Staking and options trading to help you earn. At settlement, if the price of ETH is within a certain range, options trading will achieve up to {high}% APR. If the price moves outside the range, staking will make sure your {low}% APR.
astria_fund_questions_num_2_what_is_astr: Staking, also known as equity pledging, refers to the act of pledging tokens in a specific blockchain project to support the operation of the blockchain network and obtain rewards through the Proof of Stake (PoS) mechanism.

Pionex's Staking Service is a value-added service that enables users to pledge their idle Digital Assets. If you choose to stake ETH, your ETH will be pledged at liquid staking of Lido protocol or stETH AMM pool of Curve protocol. Your rewards include Ethereum PoS staking incentives via Lido protocol and reward from Curve Protocol.

astria_fund_questions_num_4_auto_invest: 4. What is automatic reinvestment? What are the benefits of automatic reinvestment?
astria_fund_questions_num_4_auto_invest_: There is a period of time between the redemption of the previous round and the investment of the next round where your funds are not actively invested. With automatic reinvestment, you can invest your funds into Staking automatically during this period, earning an annualized percentage yield (APY) of 2.75% in ETH. This feature can help you maximize your profits and save time by avoiding the need to subscribe to each round of ETH Principal-Protected No.1 manually.
astria_fund_questions_num_5_auto_invest_: 5. How do I enable or disable automatic reinvestment?

You can enable automatic reinvestment when subscribing to the product, or modify the settings in Order Details after subscription. Please note that automatic reinvestment cannot be disabled during the last hour before the subscription period ends and the half hour before the redemption.

astria_fund_history_aggressive_modal_est: The fund redemption is expected to take 1 to 7 days, and the estimated value is calculated based on the latest management condition. The final value will be based on the net asset value at the time of redemption completion.
Estimated redemption amount = Initial investment * Estimated NAV at redemption / NAV at the time of fund share confirmation.
astria_fund_questions_aggressive_num_1_a:
Profits are generated on T+1 day based on T day’s purchase, and can be viewed on the T+2 day. (a purchase request submitted before 15:00 on T day is considered as a request on the same day, while those submitted after 15:00 are considered as a request on the next trading day)

Calculation rule:

Total profits = share purchased * (Net asset value of last trading day / Net asset value of purchasing day)
astria_fund_questions_aggressive_num_2: 2. How is the redemption amount calculated?
astria_fund_questions_aggressive_num_2_a:
Redemption amount = Redemption share * Net asset value of T-day

1) Redemption share: Same as the share purchased.

2) T-day net value: This refers to the net asset value on the due date, it is displayed on product detail page.
astria_fund_questions_aggressive_num_3: 3. What are the risks of an aggressive Easy Earn?
astria_fund_questions_aggressive_num_3_a: The aggressive Easy Earn is a net asset value-based product and does not promise to protect your principal. You can be check any information on product details page. Please make your investment based on your individual risk tolerance and personal preference.

future_trial_fund_answer_2_1: Futures bonus can only be used for manual futures trading and it can not be used for spot and Earn products.The profit can be withdrawn, but the bonus cannot.
future_trial_fund_answer_2_4: Any bonus that has not been used within 7 days will be reclaimed automatically.The bonus that has been used will also be reclaimed after deducting the trading fees, funding costs, and any losses(if applicable) from closing positions.The reclaiming of the bonus may affect the liquidation price, so please be aware of the risk of liquidation and manage your positions reasonably.
future_trial_fund_question_4: 4. How to invite new users to participate in the futures bonus event?
future_trial_fund_answer_4: Invite new users to complete {kyc} and register for the futures bonus event. When the cumulative manual futures trading volume requirement is met, you both will receive the bonus.

more_questions_title1: 1.Can I use a credit card to purchase cryptocurrencies on Pionex?
more_questions_content1: Yes. Complete Pionex's KYC 2, and choose the cryptocurrency you want to buy in the Express section, you can then use Visa/Mastercard to purchase cryptocurrencies.
more_questions_title2: 2.Does Pionex charge a fee for buying cryptocurrency?
more_questions_content2: Pionex supports buying cryptocurrencies through multiple third-party channels. Pionex does not charge any buying fee. All fees are charged by the third-party channels based on the payment method. Users can choose the best offer based on the quoted rankings.
more_questions_title3: 3.How long will it take for the cryptocurrency I bought to be credited to my account?
more_questions_content3: The time it takes to credit your account can vary depending on the payment method. The quickest could be within a few minutes.
more_questions_title4: 4.How can I check if the cryptocurrency I bought has been credited to my account?
more_questions_content4: Pionex will send an email notification once the cryptocurrency has been credited to your account. You can also check the order status in "Orders - Buy Crypto Orders" in the navigation bar.

tasks_center_faq_desc:
<style>1. Rules of Task Center:</style>
     • Users can click "Compele the task" during the Campaign. They'll be asked to finish the tasks on different task cards.
    <style>2. Detailed rules for task cards:</style>
       • Each task card has different detailed requirements, users can check the details of each task card.
    <style>3. How to claim the futures bonus after completing a task?</style>
       • Each time you enter the Task Center page, it automatically refreshes the status of each task you can participate in. For tasks that have met the "Complete" condition, the status will automatically update to "Claim";
       • After you click "Claim," the trial funds go through a one-day review. Once approved, they're added to your contract account automatically.
       • After the task is completed, the futures bonus will be valid for 7 days until it is received. If it exceeds 7 days, it will be deemed to have expired and has not been claimed.
    <style>4. How to use the futures bonus?</style>
    • The Futures bonus can only be used for manual Futures trading, and is not available for spot, earn, futures grid, and other products. The profit can be withdrawn, but the futures bonus itself cannot be withdrawn.
    • futures bonus can be used as a margin for trading, and can also be used to deduct trading fees, losses, and funding fees.
    • Any asset transfer out of the futures account before the futures bonus is expired will cause your futures bonus to be reclaimed.
    • The validity period of the futures bonus is 7 days. Unused futures bonus will be reclaimed with in 7 days. Used futures bonus will also be reclaimed after offsetting transaction fees, funding fees, and losses (if any). The reclamation of futures bonus may affect the liquidation price, so please be aware of the risk of liquidation and manage your position accordingly.
    • To get trial funds, you must complete KYC2 verification.
    • It is prohibited to use unfair practices such as wash trading or multiple accounts to defraud futures bonus. Once confirmed, the accounts will be banned, and all futures bonus in the account will be reclaimed.
    • Malicious practices to gain unfair profits, like opening or operating multiple accounts under one IP, are strictly prohibited. If confirmed, Pionex may disqualify offenders from the event.
    • For similar activities in the same period, rewards will be given on a preferential basis.
    <style>5. How to invite new users to participate in the futures bonus campaign?</style>
    • Invite new users to complete KYC2 and the corresponding tasks, and meet the manual futures cumulative trading volume requirement, both parties will receive futures bonus.
    <style>6. Where to check the rewards?</style>
    • futures bonus rewards can be viewed in the "futures bonus record" page.
    <style>7. Pionex reserves the final interpretation right of this event, and the platform retains the right to adjust tasks and rewards according to market conditions.</style>

grid_sl_set_with_delay_bottom_text_to_qu: When the price hits {price}, a {delay} second(s) countdown starts. If the price stays below {price} after the countdown, the bot will be closed. Then, the {base} will be sold and the {quote} returned to your primary account.
grid_sl_set_with_delay_bottom_text_to_us: When the price hits {price}, a {delay} second(s) countdown starts. If the price stays below {price} after the countdown, the bot will be closed, selling all {base} and {quote}, and returning USDT to your primary account.
auto_exchanges_desc:
Under the Multi-Assets mode, auto exchange will happen under 3 circumstances:
1. When Asset Wallet Balance is less than autoExchangeThreshold (such as {coin}: -10,000);
2. When the account is forcibly liquidated, if the balance in the contract account is insufficient to cover the loss, then an automatic exchange will be triggered instantly.
3. If you are currently not holding a position or have no orders, the system will continue to calculate the Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio. When the LTV is greater than or equal to 1, an automatic exchange will be triggered.
For example, when the balance is -10,000 {coin}, an automatic exchange will be triggered. 10,000 {coin} / 97.5% = 10,257 {coin} equivalent BTC will automatically be exchanged into {coin} and added to the wallet balance.
When the automatic exchange is triggered, if there are multiple assets in the multi-collateral account, these assets will be automatically exchanged into the negative balance asset according to their respective ratios. To prevent automatic exchange, before reaching the automatic exchange threshold, users can transfer or actively exchange the negative balance assets.
not_supported_yet_multi_assets_margin_mo: The Multi-Assets Mode does not currently support placing orders on the website.
hoard_coins_redeeming_tip: The principal and interest of the order will be redeemed to your account at {date}, and the daily interest can still be obtained before this time.
